founders.name: Alex Circei, Founder
founders.description:
Chat GPT 4 Description: 

Alex Circei is an entrepreneur and technology professional. He is the co-founder and CEO of Waydev, an analytics platform for engineering leaders. Waydev helps engineering managers and executives gain insights into their software development teams' performance by analyzing codebases, pull requests, and other development metrics.

Before founding Waydev, Alex Circei had been involved in multiple technology companies and projects, gaining experience in software developmen

founders.name: Valentin Buzea, Founder
founders.description:
Software is eating the world, but we are not data-driven in understanding software development.

Most of the software development reports are related to manual input from engineers, Waydev generates useful reports for managers, without the input of the engineers.

Waydev provides value with real-time metrics for your daily stand-ups, 1-to-1 meetings, history of your engineers' work, and benchmarking the stats with the industry average.

generated_description:
**Waydev: Your AI Ally in Software Engineering Intelligence**

Founded in 2017 and backed by Y Combinator, Waydev is a San Francisco-based startup that’s setting the stage for AI-driven insights in software engineering. With a lean team of 15, their mission is clear: harness the power of artificial intelligence to enhance productivity and boost team well-being in software development.

Initially targeting engineering leadership, Waydev has evolved to provide AI agents that predict project outcomes, assess team sentiment, and offer actionable suggestions to improve workflows. This focus is not just on metrics but also on nurturing the health and morale of teams—something that can often be overlooked in the demanding tech landscape.

Waydev operates within the growing Software Engineering Intelligence (SEI) market, a niche that’s becoming increasingly vital as organizations strive to streamline operations. Features like DORA metrics, cycle time analysis, and pull request insights provide real-time visibility into software delivery efficiency, allowing companies to fine-tune their engineering processes with precision.

What really sets Waydev apart is its commitment to integrating seamlessly with existing engineering tools. Its platform collects data from various sources—think git repositories, ticketing systems, and CI/CD pipelines—to give a cohesive view of team performance. This means that rather than complex manual reporting, teams can focus on innovation and delivery.

As a recognized market leader—evidence by their accolades on platforms like G2—Waydev is gaining traction among companies of all sizes, including Fortune 500 enterprises. Its user-friendly interface and robust analytics capabilities not only help teams increase throughput but also ensure their efforts align with broader business objectives.

In a world where the pace of software development never ceases, Waydev stands as a vital partner for engineering teams that want to thrive. If you’re looking to transform your engineering processes with AI-driven insights, Waydev offers a compelling solution that promises to make the invisible—visible. You can explore more about Waydev and their offerings by visiting their [website](https://waydev.co).
